BAT.JO.summary: Brait SE, an investment holding company, focuses on its investment portfolio of sizeable unlisted businesses operating in the consumer sector. The company's primary investment portfolio includes Virgin Active, Premier, Iceland Foods, and New Look. The company's New Look business offers clothing products and footwear for women and teenage girls; and provides menswear through online. It also operates 243 health clubs under Virgin Active in South Africa, the United Kingdom, Italy, Australia, Namibia, Botswana, Thailand, and Singapore. In addition, the company operates Premier, which produces fast moving consumer goods, including wheat flour, maize meal, bread, feminine hygiene products, sugar confectionery, pasta, biscuit, animal feeds, and other food products in South Africa, Eswatini, Lesotho, and Mozambique. Further, the company manufactures and supplies glass packaging products to the beverage and food companies through Consol in South Africa, Nigeria, and Kenya. Brait SE was incorporated in 2011 and is based in San Gwann, Malta.
